segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall any second now, and no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her hand outstretched like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip backward, and he’s going down with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t get hurt when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
